laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Complete Blood Count and Tests of Renal and Liver Function

laboratory_examinations.findings: Enlarging, multicystic kidneys (right kidney, 14.8 cm in length; left kidney, 15.7 cm)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Gradually enlarging polycystic kidneys with 50 to 100 cysts and distortion of the renal architecture

laboratory_examinations.findings: Complex cyst in the lower pole of the left kidney had an increase in the number and thickness of septations (from 1.8 cm to 3.0 to 3.4 cm)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued slight enlargement of the complex cyst four months later, with increasingly conspicuous enhancement of a stellate central component

laboratory_examinations.date: One month after 6.5 years of age
laboratory_examinations.findings: No increase in the size of the complex cyst; cystic areas were smaller compared to previous study, and the central component appeared more solid and enhanced
